Performance Tasks
=================

.. warning::
    Looking for the raw code or download? `See the GitHub repository <https://github.com/alanqchen/FEHRobot>`_.

These are the performance tasks code, shown here for your convenience.
Note that for performance task 4, we began to use the full final code, thus
you should refer to the :doc:`/general/mainFile` or
`raw code <https://github.com/alanqchen/FEHRobot>`_. Also note that all
performance and bonus tasks were completed successfully and ahead of schedule.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :name: toc-perf-ref
   :glob:

   perf_*
